color.description: Key of theme.colors or any CSS color value, 'yellow' by default
color.description_zh: theme.colors 的键或任何 CSS 颜色值，默认为 'yellow'

count.description_zh: 控件数量，默认为 5 个

defaultValue.description_zh: 非受控零部件的默认值

emptySymbol.description: Icon displayed when the symbol is empty
emptySymbol.description_zh: 元件为空时显示的图标

fractions.description: Number of fractions each item can be divided into, 1 by default
fractions.description_zh: 每个项目可以划分为的分数数，默认为 1

fullSymbol.description: Icon displayed when the symbol is full
fullSymbol.description_zh: 元件已满时显示的图标

getSymbolLabel.description: A function to assign aria-label of the the control at index given in the argument. If not specified, control index is used as aria-label.
getSymbolLabel.description_zh: 一个函数，用于分配参数中给定的索引处控件的 aria-label。如果未指定，则 control index 用作 aria-label。

highlightSelectedOnly.description: If set, only the selected symbol changes to full symbol when selected, false by default
highlightSelectedOnly.description_zh: 如果设置，则只有所选元件在选中时更改为完整元件，默认情况下为 false

name.description: name attribute passed down to all inputs. By default, name is generated randomly.
name.description_zh: name 属性传递给所有输入。默认情况下，name 是随机生成的。

onHover.description: Called when one of the controls is hovered
onHover.description_zh: 将鼠标悬停在其中一个控件上时调用

readOnly.description: If set, the user cannot interact with the component, false by default
readOnly.description_zh: 如果设置，则用户无法与组件交互，默认情况下为 false
